title: This new HUD actually makes me feel physically uncomfortable...
body:
After playing a couple of games with the new HUD implemented today i couldn't help but feel physically uncomfortable, my eyes began to hurt, i started to get a really bad headache, i felt completely lost/ overwhelmed and all i wanted to do was STOP playing, it's so bad that i actually have no desire to return to LoL until the new HUD receives major improvements or they give us the option to switch back to the old design, this is the first time a cosmetic change has actually put me off playing LoL and iv been playing since early S2.

Does anyone else feel the same way playing with the new HUD or is it just me? 

Oh and if you think the posts about the new HUD are bad here then you should probably check out the NA boards, they're a lot more active: http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/
